titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2775) to condition the provision of premium and cost-sharing subsidies under the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act upon a certification that a program to verify household income and other qualifications for such subsidies is operational, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 113-206, by Mr. Burgess.
The resolution provides that the amendment printed in the report shall be considered as adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 51.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 339.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H.Res. 339, the Chair put the question on ordering the previous question on H.Res. 339 and by voice vote, announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. Burgess demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings on the question of ordering the previous question on H. Res. 339 until a time to be announced.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 227 - 196 (Roll no. 456).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 228 - 195 (Roll no. 457).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/10/2013--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2775) to condition the provision of premium and cost-sharing subsidies under the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act upon a certification that a program to verify household income and other qualifications for such subsidies is operational.
